year planner

About Royale Concorde International School, Kalyan Nagar, CBSE

Celebrating Twenty Years of Excellence!

Royale Concorde International School (CBSE) in Kalyan Nagar proudly stands as the esteemed institution established by Royale Concorde Educational Trust.

In the pursuit of providing quality education and fostering comprehensive student development, Royale Concorde International School, Kalyan Nagar, sets itself apart. Located in the vibrant city of Bangalore, known as India’s IT hub and a center of knowledge, our school sits along the Outer Ring Road at Banaswadi, Bangalore. Our remarkable infrastructure is thoughtfully designed to offer a unique pedagogical experience and an environment conducive to holistic growth.

Education plays a leading role in equipping students to meet the challenges that lie ahead and commit to the pursuit of excellence, social justice, and higher ethical standards. In this context, RCIS is striving hard to bring out children with commitment and creativity not only in the areas of their specialization but also well-groomed to become independent thinkers, enabling them to achieve their desired goals.

Any institution’s glory is not only through its building and infrastructure but also through their consistent progress from strength to strength. I am happy to note that RCIS is excellent in all domains. The school emphasizes education with values through learner-centered approaches rather than ritualistic learning of facts. Our vision is clearly based on hard work, teamwork, and ethics. This visionary culture allows students to not only adapt to present-day challenges but also fulfil individual responsibilities to society and our country at large. I’m sure RCIS is a step ahead in uniting teachers, students, and parents to bring out the best in human resources around the globe.

Dr. Shruthi Gowda

Managing Trustee

Key Features

  • Thoughtfully designed and spacious classrooms ensuring proper ventilation.
  • Advanced central monitoring, intercom, and public address system.
  • Round-the-clock security services for a safe learning environment.
  • Modern computerization for enhanced learning experiences.
  • Convenient lift facilities for access to upper floors.
  • Uninterrupted power supply with a reliable generator backup.
  • Ergonomically designed furniture, providing individual desks for each student.
  • A well-equipped auditorium with a seating capacity of 400 for various school activities.
  • An in-house cafeteria catering to students' nutritional needs.
  • A Reverse Osmosis Plant ensures access to safe and clean drinking water.
  • Stringent smoke detectors and adherence to fire safety standards.
  • At Royale Concorde International School, we are committed to providing a nurturing and secure educational environment that promotes both academic excellence and personal growth.

Principal’s Message

Mrs. Pinkey Singh

Principal

We hope to present you with a glimpse of the way Royale Concorde International School plans to go about its mission of bringing up its children to be world citizens while being steeped in Indian traditions and value system. While Academics is our primary focus area, we accord equal importance to the other aspects of a wholesome education. In a world solely (and, perhaps, mindlessly) running after mark sheets portraying near Centum, we hope to present a saner voice. The true success of our children will depend as much on the stellar grades they achieve as on the way they conduct themselves, think and articulate those thoughts, handle adversity and the dignity and integrity with which they function. Royale Concorde International School pledges to provide Education that encompasses all of these.

We realise that for the above to happen, the parents and teachers at home and the parents and teachers here at school must come together in a partnership based on mutual trust and respect. Together, we hope to take Royale Concorde International School from strength to strength as it creates an organisational culture that’ll promote the virtues and skill sets that we wish to see in our children by the time they pass out from the portals of this august institution. Together we’ll create a generation of world citizens who will be well prepared to handle the ever-increasing challenges of sustaining a planet that we call our world.

‘There's no saying where a teacher's influence ends. She affects eternity...’

-Henry Adams

Profile

  • Is a graduate of Lucknow University and holds a Master's Degree in English and Psychology, a B.Ed from the Isabella Thoburn College and a Diploma in Digital Literacy from the University of Pennsylvania's Graduate School of Education.
  • Has a rich experience of 28 years in some of the best schools of the country. Before joining Royale Concorde International School, she has worked with Bhavan's Vidya Mandir, The Aditya Birla Public School of The Aditya Birla Group and the Head of Quality Control, Research and Development for the 24 Branches of the Sunbeam Group of Institutions.
  • Has conducted many workshops on Effective Communication, 21st Century Skills, Curriculum Implementation, NEP 2020, Mind Tools and VUCA among other topics of modern-day school education.
  • Has travelled widely and interacted with schools across the country and overseas.
  • Has acquired core competencies in Leadership & Teamwork, Critical Thinking, Collaborative Planning and Implementation.
  • Is blessed with a Positive Attitude and Physical Fitness that is the source of her joyous spirit and endless energy.
  • Is passionate about her hobbies that include Reading, Writing Articles, Online Blogs, Quizzing, Travelling to distant lands and Giving Motivational talks.

Curriculum

Pre-Primary Level PlaySchool, Nursery & KinderGarten

  • Pre-Primary: Cognitive skills, neatness, and language fluency.
  • Activities: Field trips, arts, and crafts enhance creativity and motor skills.
  • Building self-confidence and social skills with Rhyme Time and Show & Tell.

Primary Level Class I to V

  • Fluency in spoken and written English through interactive teaching.
  • Mathematics: Develop number concepts, elementary geometry, and mental math skills.
  • Environmental Science: Learn science through hands-on activities, observation, and discovery.
  • Introduction to computers: Theory and practical experience for connected learning.
  • Holistic education: Embrace values, arts, crafts, and sports activities for well-rounded learning.

Middle Level School Class VI to VIII

Class VI to VIII

  • Accelerated academics, promoting questioning, hypothesizing, analysis, and creativity.
  • Follow CBSE's three-language policy, offering Hindi, Kannada & Sanskrit/French as 3rd languages.
  • Emphasis on teamwork through group discussions, projects, activities, and experimentation.
  • Hands-on learning of Math and Science concepts in dedicated labs.

Secondary Level School IX and X

  • CBSE's integrated two-year curriculum for holistic assessment.
  • Focus on life skills, values, sports, and co-curricular activities.
  • Subjects include English, Hindi/Kannada, Math, General Science, Social Science.
  • Option for Artificial Intelligence as the 6th subject.
  • Two variants of Mathematics available for Grade X board exams.

Senior Secondary Level Class XI and XII

  • Senior Secondary: Two-year study program in Science, Commerce, and Humanities.
  • Science stream divided into Engineering and Medical branches. # Optional subjects for Engineering and Medical students.
  • Commerce stream offers optional subjects including Applied Mathematics and Legal Studies.
  • Humanities stream offers Legal Studies and Home Science.
  • Experienced faculty prepares students for professional learning.
  • Achieving excellence in Board exams, competitive exams, and professional placements.

Year Planner

Admission

Unlock Your Child’s Bright Future at Royale Concorde International School Kalyan Nagar CBSE School – Apply Now!

Click Here

Facilities

Our school offers a well-designed, aesthetically pleasing campus with well-ventilated classrooms with excellent amenities such as Medicare service, 24-hour security, sports clubs, a library, a play area, and state of art computer laboratories. Highly experienced faculties to deliver to competition. As a result, Royale Concorde International School has earned the reputation of being among the top schools in Bangalore. We’ve also earned a slew of international awards. Students in our school enjoy discovering new interests and making lifelong friends within a kind and caring community. They leave us with a distinctive sense of character, self-confidence, and resourcefulness, with the knowledge and skills necessary to become a leader in the world.
